thread.title: Chicago developer plans rentals, hotel and grocery in Prospect Park
thread.title_full: Chicago developer plans rentals, hotel and grocery in Prospect Park

author: Cali Owings
title: Chicago developer plans rentals, hotel and grocery in Prospect Park
text:
Apartment Sales Tracker Home / News / Construction & Development / Chicago developer plans rentals, hotel and grocery in Prospect Park A rendering shows a proposed mixed-use tower with apartments, hotel and a grocery store at 2929 University Ave. SE. near the Prospect Park light rail stop on the Green Line. (Submitted rendering: Tushie Montgomery Architects) Chicago developer plans rentals, hotel and grocery in Prospect Park By: Cali Owings July 31, 2015 10:13 am 0 The project would include 258 apartments, a 120-room hotel and about 36,000 square feet of retail for a grocery store, liquor store and restaurant.
